title: Bloomberg's Bender on RNC Convention Lacking Excitement (Audio)
itunes:title: Bloomberg's Bender on RNC Convention Lacking Excitement (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Michael Bender, Senior US Politics reporter for Bloomberg, in Cleveland for a look at the Republican National Convention.
